alert.note: Alert for Beaver; Texas (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 08 at 11:24PM CDT until July 09 at 12:15AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Beaver County in the Panhandle of Oklahoma... Eastern Texas County in the Panhandle of Oklahoma... * Until 1215 AM CDT. * At 1123 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles north of Floris to 6 miles west of Hooker, moving south at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. * Locations impacted include... Beaver, Hooker, Tyrone, Forgan, Hardesty, Elmwood, Adams, Boyd, Floris, Bryans Corner, Baker, Mocane, Turpin and Balko. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
